website_summaries.verdict: A solid choice for budget-conscious consumers searching for a reliable and affordable towel warmer.
pros: A top choice for its energy-efficient design that doesn't compromise its ability to heat towels
cons: Lacks stability, so it's best to place it against a wall or a similar solid surface

customer_reviews.title: In my opinion having a warm towel to use is secondary to not having to use a clean towel every day.  Less Laundry!
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day. I put my towel on it to dry out after taking a shower so I'm able to reuse the same towel for a week or so. It doesn't start smelling like mildew. I used to set it on a timer but just leave it on all the time now. In my opinion having a warm towel to use is secondary to not having to use a clean towel every day. Less Laundry!
customer_reviews.author: DAVID N.

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money!!!- please don’t buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Got really desappointed! Barely warm one towel. Do NOT waste your money with it. Got as a gift for my husband and literally is a piece of junk:( Do not buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Ferreira G Bittar

customer_reviews.title: Works great on towels
customer_reviews.text: We got this towel heater after renovating our bathroom and we didn't want to hang towels over the brand new custom door we got for the shower. This heater only uses 105Watts and it can be left on all the time. It actually gets pretty warm - almost hot. I hooked it up to a timer to save money because both our towels will dry with just 7 hours of heat. You have to fold the towels in thirds for them to dry better. We fit both our towels. We also use the other rungs for the washcloths. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: William A. Morales

customer_reviews.title: I like to reuse my towel between showers
customer_reviews.text: I like to reuse my towel between showers. It usually takes ONE day before it smells bad UNTIL I got this towel warmer! I couldn't care less about the warmth, which it does do by the way. I wanted it to dry my towels and it does a fantastic job. I actually bought another one so I could have two towel dryers to use at the same time! Wish I had found these sooner! I used the equipment to hang them from the wall and love it.
customer_reviews.author: SRC2010

customer_reviews.title: Short and small
customer_reviews.text: The will likely not handle bath “sheets”. Make sure you measure your towels at their half-way point to make certain they will drape properly and not touch the floor. This item is good for towels just a little larger than hand towels. Think gym shower towels...
customer_reviews.author: GEORGE E. NEWMAN

customer_reviews.title: Towel Warming Rack is "Okay"
customer_reviews.text: This product was shipped right away. It came in a light weight flat box. Minimal assembly was required. It's construction is sturdy enough and it stands evenly and wobble-free. I have to always keep it plugged in and turned on in order for the towels to be warmed. In other words, you cannot turn it on, jump in the shower and expect your towels to be warmed up by the time your shower is over. It takes way more time than that! Finally, towels are warm in spots and not warm in other spots. Do not expect the same warming effect you get when a fresh towel is just out of the clothes dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Kowalkowski

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: We don't use it to pre-heat towels but rather to help dry towels faster after we take a shower. Reading the reviews first helped ensure that people are positive about that part. We also bought the little timer that allows us to set e.g. 30 minutes and walk away.
customer_reviews.author: Sabine

customer_reviews.title: Best thing about the morning
customer_reviews.text: After a trip to the UK my wife insisted on getting a towel warmer as we had in the hotels there. It really is nice to step out of the shower on a cold winter day into a hot towel. wound up buying one for each of us and putting them on a smart plug to warm up before we even get out of bed. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: BigDawg1955

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Hold Up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this towel rack 4 months ago and it just broke. Started overheating. It comes with a 30 day warranty so I can’t even exchange it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Make sure it can support what you’re plan for use is. I have 3 towels on mine and the feet broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: This is a very poorly constructed rack. Within months the screws holding the legs in place are broken. My last heated towel rack lasted for 10 years and my towels were always very warm.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Z. Silverstein

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars at first but now 5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup, does the job,does warm up but wish it warmed more UPDATE: I TAKE.IT BACK, This thing is really hot now. Cool! I mean, HOT! .
customer_reviews.author: N. Jesus

customer_reviews.title: The brackets are cheap plastic and pull off easily.
customer_reviews.text: It keeps out towels warm but you have to be careful pulling the towels off the rack. The brackets are cheap plastic and pull off easily.
customer_reviews.author: shcommish

customer_reviews.title: It's not really powerful enough
customer_reviews.text: This warmer works, but not very well. The inside of the towel that touches the bars gets warm, but there's not enough heat to carry out to the rest of the towel. If you fold the towel to place it on the rack, only one half of the towel will actually warm. It IS nice to dry out towels after you use them, but that's about it. The unit also takes about 45 minutes to heat up to a functional level, so unless you leave it on all the time, it's not that useful. And if you do leave it on all the time, you're using 120 watts of power, which is like leaving two desk lamps on 24/7.
customer_reviews.author: nashBridges

customer_reviews.title: For the price it's great
customer_reviews.text: It's bulky but not wide enough for you body towels, so if it's on the floor the towel can drape over the side and be fine. If it's mounted on the wall however you have to fold in the edges so they don't get warm and sometimes not even dry. It shuts itself off after a period of time and doesn't get too hot. Which is great so no worry of starting a fire. My complaints are what i stated above and the fact that the mounts that came with it are made of a cheezy white plastic. I don't even want to mount if because i feel it's unsafe.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Warm towel after a shower
customer_reviews.text: Works great keeping my towels from staying wet long and having a warm towel when I get out of the shower. Could be a little taller to make room for two towels more easily and would like a longer power cord.
customer_reviews.author: madgamer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect solution for a towel rack in a newly remodeled bathroom, plus we have the added benefit of a towel warmer. We didn't want to put holes in our wall for a towel rack, so this works perfectly. It really does warm the towels nicely and I also bought the Belkin timer recommended by others. I would recommend this towel warmer to anyone who has a small space. The brushed satin finish goes perfectly with my faucets and shower heads. I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Greeneyes2u

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. Great output of heat and definitely up to the quality of a much more expensive Italian made product that had developed problems. No problem recommending this.
customer_reviews.author: Saltwater Diva

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a few months. We put one towel folded in 2 length wise at a time which geta dry in about 40 mins. No complaints as it provides hanging space and our towels dont get moldy after 2 uses in a bathroom without windows. Wish it had a timer but never had any issues when left on overnight by accident. Wont butn you to the touch but it does get got.
customer_reviews.author: Dshak

customer_reviews.title: Mmmmmmm - warm towels!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this towel warmer. I don't know why American home builders don't include these in their designs. Nothing beats getting out of the shower and having a warm towel waiting! To get the best results, I lay another towel over the one close to the warming bars, and so it is warm all over. I plug it in an hour or so before my shower, because the bars are low heat and takes a while to warm the towel, but it is so worth the wait!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Does not work well. It doesn't warm the towels and it is WAY TOO SMALL for a normal sized bath towel. It's just junk, a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: HellKittyNinja

customer_reviews.title: Returning
customer_reviews.text: Never really made the towels warm, but as a fancy towel bar that slightly speeds the drying time of a wet towel, it’s not terrible. Just expected more. Oh and the zip ties used to package it were so tight I scratched up the bars just getting it open. Scratched soo easily I think the finish will get very scratched over time. Sadly I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: Jill N Stahl

customer_reviews.title: Its not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Warms the towel while I shower but its not really hot enough..maybe I should take a longer shower. I did learn a trick to put another towel on top of it so I may try this. Its not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: DIsappointing - hardly warms
customer_reviews.text: Use for two towels - didn't do a good job heating. Use with one towel .... just barely warm. If setting on floor with legs, hard to turn on/off with button
customer_reviews.author: Just Mike's Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Does not really work.
customer_reviews.text: Did not sit level and did not work well. I returned it. Its better to throw your towel in the dryer for one minute. This did not warm up my towel much let along dry a wet towel. Maybe if you left it on for a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: G. Irwin

customer_reviews.title: A Dryer it not
customer_reviews.text: if you allow about 30 min before your shower it might get nice and warm (like a dryer) but a otherwise its just going to be a little warm. I would not pay this high price for it again. On a light towel it did better but thick towels only one side would get warm during a normal shower (normal for me less than 15 min).
customer_reviews.author: Bilster

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, cheap to buy,
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived a little bent, so it didn't mount up straight on the wall. One of the mounts is about a half-inch away from the wall, the other three are in nice and tight. It does take about 30mn to warm up. If you're careful to wrap the towel around the bar, it does warm up a towel nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price! It only really fits one large or two medium towels at once. I tried what I read in other reviews and put a second towel over the first - this definitely made the towel way warmer. No issues at all after a month of use.
customer_reviews.author: sara0411

customer_reviews.title: We love this
customer_reviews.text: our towels always smelled sour the next morning if we showered twice. now they are warm and dry each morning and evening! So much better than a wet towel!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warms small and medium sized RR
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for my parents to use in their bathroom. Warms the space easily for both small and medium sized restrooms. It is also easily portable to use in other rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Durham

customer_reviews.title: Excellent towel dryer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent towel dryer. I don't really care for the warm towel, but I can drape a nice thick cotton towel over this and in a few hours it is nice and dry. No more smelly damp towels after a couple of showers. You can use the same towel many more times, definitely saves on washing costs.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Tank

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your hard-earned money
customer_reviews.text: Sorry but this just didn't live up to what I had hoped. The towels don't get hot at all (barely warm) and, to be honest, they do better by tossing them in the dryer for a few minutes prior to the use. It was a wasted expenditure and terribly disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: SherryD

customer_reviews.title: good product!
customer_reviews.text: I had wanted one of these for months. It looks great and does exactly what it says it will do. My daughter loves throwing her blankets on top of it. Problem is my fiance also uses it to hang his clothes he wants to wear again tomorrow. Ends yup being the catch all the that treadmill you put in the corner of your room. Still want to keep trying though.
customer_reviews.author: coolbeans

customer_reviews.title: at best, the towels were not cold"
customer_reviews.text: I put towels over it a few hours before I took a shower, at best, the towels were not cold". I did the same for a whole week hoping a miracle would happen. Nope! sorry....I'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Marvellux

customer_reviews.title: Bought another one for another bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I already bought one of these a few months ago and love it in our master bathroom. My daughter complained why didn't she have one too since it's so awesome, so being the good mother I am I bought her one for her bathroom. No more complaints from her :)
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Dries Hand Washing
customer_reviews.text: This warmer will dries my hand washing in a few hours as well as warms my towels. I have not noticed a jump in electricity usage though there may be some, having started using it in winter when usage is higher.
customer_reviews.author: Anita V.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little small will not a comodate two peoples towels, otherwise great
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: towel warmer
customer_reviews.text: The entire unit gets hot to the touch. It does warm the towels but only the parts touching the "rods". I like that it's lightweight and stylish. Maybe I need to figure a better way to hang the towels so they can completely heat. I bought it due to high humidity in my area. I think it is worth it but I was hoping for better heat disbursement.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad price but to me did not heat towel
customer_reviews.text: Not long enough and you can only use with one towel if you want it to heat or dry it. Intention was not for drying but to have a warm towel. Sad but only top of towel was a little warm. Returned!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite thing about the first world
customer_reviews.text: This towel rack really makes me love the first world. Burning fossil fuels for the sake of that fleeting sense of warmth when picking up a towel? Count me in. I love this towel rack - I wall mounted it in my closet, and it has completely eliminated the odors from my wet towels. It's a sleek, modern looking rack, and the color of the rack complements any wall color very well.
customer_reviews.author: therealcheesecake

customer_reviews.title: Great towel rack
customer_reviews.text: Great towel rack. I have one that I use daily to keep my towel warm during colder months and keep the towel dry to avoid stale smell during warm months. I bought this one for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to use,
customer_reviews.text: I use it in my bathroom for my towels. It is wonderful to have warm towel to dry yourself after shower.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It just doesn't warm the towels as much as I ...
customer_reviews.text: It just doesn't warm the towels as much as I was expecting. You have to weave the towel through the bars to get real warmth.
customer_reviews.author: sallykintz

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I matched this up with an outlet timer since I don't need it to be on all day. What can I say, it does the job for a fraction of the price of other units. This is the correct size for even the largest towel.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Great Warmer
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, looks great in the bathroom - I have it mounted on the wall and plugged into a wall socket for a year now. It takes some time for the towels to dry, don't expect to switch it on and have a dry towel within minutes. If it's on, it will stay warm to the touch, no threat of burning you or anyone else - it doesn't get hot , just warm. My parents liked it so much, they asked me to order one for them too. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Mareeya

customer_reviews.title: its okay
customer_reviews.text: I get what I pay for, and this says to let it heat the towel at least 20 mins before use. We do but it only heats the section of the towel that's draped over the bar. Or you have to weave the towel in and out which is not very fun but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Socha

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This thing does not heat up my towels. It was a mistake to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Thacker

customer_reviews.title: not the best
customer_reviews.text: Bought this type so entire towel would get warm, That doesn't really happen. Use it as a clothes rack now
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Seems to take a really long time to heat up ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to take a really long time to heat up plus my bigger towels have to be folded over to fit between the brackets that attach to the wall. Not a big fan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The towel rack does a great job heating and drying your towels
customer_reviews.text: The towel rack does a great job heating and drying your towels. We used the legs for a free standing rack - legs are a little wobbly but we do have it on carpet and not on a flat surface.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Losi

customer_reviews.title: Made in CHINA!
customer_reviews.text: The product is made in China. Not in Germany as it was written. Don’t pay an overpriced item.
customer_reviews.author: Marina Mendes Tavares

customer_reviews.title: I use this in my massage practice
customer_reviews.text: I always like to add value to my massage services. I use this to warm up towels and blankets for my clients for extra comfort. It works well. My clients love having a warm blanket placed on them if they get chilly.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia HayesTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: Well for starters it is sold as a 2-pack but only comes with one? So I'm pretty upset about that. And when the one I got was used it only heated the middle of the towel so what's the point!? This thing sucks! I want my money back 😂
customer_reviews.author: KittyBaby

customer_reviews.title: We like it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very simple, and relatively inexpensive, towel warmer. Following the lead of another amazon review, we also ordered, for about $10, a Belkin "countdown timer," very simple little plug-in that goes in the AC outlet, and then you plug this towel warmer into the Belkin, and set the Belkin (very easily, manually) for 1/2 hour, 3 hours, or 6 hours. (3 hrs should be plenty!) The Belkin is as follows, on amazon: Belkin Conserve Socket F7C009q Energy-Saving Outlet Both of these items are simple, and work fine. And the overall appearance of both is quite professional. You'll like this combo!
customer_reviews.author: David in Telluride, Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Towel warmer
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful towel warmer, just got it and it's so easy to put together and it heats real fast..so in love with this product
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bell

customer_reviews.title: Returned it.
customer_reviews.text: Our bathroom is chilly so I thought this would be a great item to buy. I get up and take my shower first thing...after 40 minutes my towel was barely warm..I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: ProFss

customer_reviews.title: Returned it. The towels don't get warm enough, ...
customer_reviews.text: Returned it. The towels don't get warm enough, even when draping other towels on top to contain the heat. I didn't think it was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Dries the towel
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product. Only took two minutes to put on the feet and plug it in. It was warm in a few minutes. Warmed the towel quickly and it dried the towel overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've had a wall mounted towel warmer and by comparison ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had a wall mounted towel warmer and by comparison this towel warmer didn't get the towel warm enough.
customer_reviews.author: L. M.

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I anticipated
customer_reviews.text: This rack was much smaller than the one I had before (that went bad). We have over-sided bath towels and it was much too small for two of them to dry adequately.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great, however could be warmer. I have had towel warmers in the past that were much warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke down in less than a year
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this towel warmer. It worked for 5 months and now the heating element on the towel warmer does not work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: We have left ours plugged in and turned on all ...
customer_reviews.text: We have left ours plugged in and turned on all the time for about 6 months now with no problems at all. Warm and dry towels whenever you need them!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Dobson

customer_reviews.title: No heat in a timley manner
customer_reviews.text: Takes way too long to warm up the towel just doesn't do what it supposed to do without leaving it on for hours and hours
customer_reviews.author: Rickyy

customer_reviews.title: Heated Towels are Best.
customer_reviews.text: Gets towels dry! Takes up very little room considering it has rather large feet. Very light weight. Does not seem to interfere with other appliances like hair dryers that usually kick the ground faults. Good piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wren

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Researched many places and found this great buy on Amazon. The item is very contemporary looking..sooo easy to install and definitely serves it's purpose. Dries up those wet towels quickly and saves me from washing them as frequently
customer_reviews.author: Kuching

customer_reviews.title: 2-pack does not mean you get two
customer_reviews.text: The buying option is for a 2-pack. I received 1 item, which is quite misleading. The unit I received works passably.
customer_reviews.author: benny_g

customer_reviews.title: Not any good
customer_reviews.text: The towel warmer only warms the towel on the top rung. Even if you thread he towel around the lower bars, it still does not warm it up.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Navarro

customer_reviews.title: I was thinking it would be just a bit wider ...
customer_reviews.text: I was thinking it would be just a bit wider and it takes quite a while for the temperature to come up.
customer_reviews.author: Jules C

customer_reviews.title: A++
customer_reviews.text: Great towel heater, only complaint its wire is not long, but that can be sorted out.
customer_reviews.author: N.A

customer_reviews.title: If you just need a hidden towel rack to dry things- this should work fine.
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy and light and it looks cheap. If you just need a hidden towel rack to dry things- this should work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't really warm up the towels very much. I have to weave the towel between the bars, and only then are the parts that are directly in contact with the bars even a bit warmer.
customer_reviews.author: David Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Nice Gift
customer_reviews.text: Gift........Person liked having warm towels after shower. Be sure you have a place that is easy to plug in for it.
customer_reviews.author: cacjr

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't heat up very hot
customer_reviews.text: I guess I should've paid more for a hotter towel warmer. Every place in Paris had one of these and I wanted one so badly. This one heats up but it doesn't get super hot.
customer_reviews.author: elkaso

customer_reviews.title: but it was a gift and the like it.
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be warmer, but it was a gift and they like it.
customer_reviews.author: Missy Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, easy to install on the wall, works fine with the timer I installed with it. Be sure to spread the wall clips wide enough for towels to slip behind the rails. Have enjoyed it for about two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Egnew

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not good. Doesn't get the towels hot enough. Buy something better.
customer_reviews.author: nzpete

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't heat as much as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe my expectations/hopes were too high but this towel warmer is slow to heat and doesn't heat very much. Seems to work better with damp towel rather than dry one.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hazard

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and use BUT did not warm towel enough to matter
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Hitchcock

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We do not have a heat source in our bathroom so, in the winter our towels seemed to never dry between uses. This towel rack has done the trick! No more damp, musty smelling towels! I bought the suggested Belkin outlet timer to go with the drying rack and set it to 30 minutes. It is really nice to heat up the towel while I shower and turn it on a few more times to get a fully dried towel. I cannot believe we did not purchase this rack sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Leonard

customer_reviews.title: A real waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible products. Does not warm the towels at all. Barely gets warm. A real waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Buyer aware! Do not buy! Fell apart in less than 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy! The plastic anchor that holds the unit and the leg disintegrated in less than 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Warm towels are nice
customer_reviews.text: Using this in the cooler months does make it comfy getting out of the warm tub or shower.
customer_reviews.author: G. Henrich

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it...Dry my towel in 3 hours and my towel is warm and nice. Is really more than I was expected.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Gourneau

customer_reviews.title: In our bathroom, towels never get fully dry. ...
customer_reviews.text: In our bathroom, towels never get fully dry. This rack dries them in around an hour or two. You can fit two towels on it if you fold them over or let them bunch up somewhat, and it dries both. It also makes towels pleasantly warm for when you get out of the shower.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ohmann

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: heats up very fast, very nice addition to our bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor job warming except where towel doubles over even if ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply built. On/off button doesn't work. Bath towels don't fit. Poor job warming except where towel doubles over even if only single towel placed on unit.
customer_reviews.author: marci

customer_reviews.title: towel warmer
customer_reviews.text: Purchased over a year ago..and it has worked really well. Nice to has a warm towel on a cold winter morning after the shower. One of life's little luxuries.
customer_reviews.author: WRKTEM

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't really warm the towels and definitely won't dry a ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't really warm the towels and definitely won't dry a wet one.....But it was cheap, so presume this is the tradeoff!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Q

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: inexpensive, a bit flimsy but works good for the second home. i did not try to mount it on a wall but it works well just standing by itself
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Towel warming rack
customer_reviews.text: Works well & looks good. I would like to have had it wide enough for two towels but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: D. e

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We love this product , it is nice to have your towels dry and warm when you need them and the price was great.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Other than that still works like a champ
customer_reviews.text: I bought one 4 years ago and it still works. The only issue is the brackets which held it on to the wall came apart within the first 2 weeks or so. Other than that still works like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Mustea

customer_reviews.title: its ok.
customer_reviews.text: takes a long time to get warm. not very sturdy or heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Dark Knight

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not very sturdy at all! But they do what they are supposed to do!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Towel Bar
customer_reviews.text: Not as easy to operate as my previous one. If you only have one towel it is great but more you are shuffling the towels all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie R. Koether

customer_reviews.title: cant even warm a hand towel
customer_reviews.text: If I hugged my towel for a minute it would be warmer
customer_reviews.author: TINA SANCES

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad
customer_reviews.text: Does what it was designed to do. Just have to remember to turn it on at least an hour before bathing, don't forget to put your towel on it while it is warming up.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Serafin

customer_reviews.title: good price.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with two small dents in it. all parts/screws were loose in box, flying around, no bags. I wished it had internal shut off timer and or flat right angle plug, to keep flush to wall. I hardwired to shut off timer. looks modern. good price.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Florida house where it's humid and nothing dries ...
customer_reviews.text: plenty of room for towels, swim suits, and lingerie. Perfect for Florida house where it's humid and nothing dries on it's own.
customer_reviews.author: linda depalo

customer_reviews.title: I've seen some crap along the years but
customer_reviews.text: I've seen some crap along the years but, this one takes first prize. Complete garbage. Save your valuable time and pass on this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: LCM Home Fashion 6-Bar Freestanding Towel Warmer, Drying Rack
product_meta.description: Home Fashion towel warmer and drying rack is ideal for bathrooms-or for any other room in the home. Thanks to its versatile design you can use it as a freestanding or wall mounted unit. Dry delicates in the laundry room, warm blankets in the bedroom, and more. Also helps eliminate mold and mildew growth. Electric towel warmers use very little energy which makes them excellent for keeping towels warm around the clock and is designed to run continuously. Unit plugs into the wall and is durable and space-efficient. No wiring or plumbing is needed; reaching optimum temperature within 30 minutes. It is recommended you leave towels on the towel rack overnight before initial use. Plugs into a standard 110-120V outlet. Dimensions 21.7-Inch W by 13.2-Inch D by 35.6-Inch H. UL Listed. Minimal assembly required.
